root.name: Tap Tap Revenge: Coldplay Edition
root.description: Tap Tap Revenge: Coldplay Edition is a rhythm game for the iPhone and iPod Touch. Like Tap Tap Revenge, players must tap on the correct note as it reaches the bottom of the screen, or shake the iPhone in a direction indicated by arrows. Unlike Tap Tap Revenge, it contains 10 licensed music tracks from Coldplay. Tap Tap Revenge: Coldplay Edition costs $4.99 (Â£2.99 and 3.99 Euro) from the itunes store.TracklistThe following songs are included in Tap Tap Revenge: Coldplay Edition:Lovers In Japan (Osaka Sun Mix) Lost! In My Place Fix You Life In Technicolor iiClocks YellowShiverSpeed Of SoundViva La VidaViva La Vida (Thin White Duke Remix)
